actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Unanimous Consent Request to Discharge the House Committee on Appropriations from Consideration and to Consider the Joint Resolution Rejected in House.

official_title: A joint resolution making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, for the Department of Agriculture.

summary.text: Makes a supplemental appropriation for FY 1985 to the Department of Agriculture to reimburse the Commodity Credit Corporation for net realized losses.

titles.title: A joint resolution making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, for the Department of Agriculture.
